"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ea79de6368724c8f940100#post_53ea79de6368724c8f940100
This was my fifth year going. Unfortunately, I didn't get a chance to get into either of the My Little Pony panels. But I did get autographs from Tara Strong, Cathy Weseluck, Andrea Libman, Meghan McCarthy, Daniel Ingram, and some other member of the production staff who I didn't recognize.

topics.body:
I'm bored with my life right now. I just want to hang out with new people. The guys I know are great but I want to go out to pubs and stuff.

Everything will change come September but for now my life is stagnating.
[spoiler]Then again I'm off on holiday in two days. Maybe I'll meet someone there.[/spoiler]

^[spoiler]Don't worry, if it's a woman I'll be sure to wear my finest fedora[/spoiler]^

^~[spoiler]M'lady[/spoiler]~^

I would really like to go to one of the MLP-specific cons, though. It seems like it would be more fun, and I feel like I'd recognize a lot more people there. Only problem is that they never seem to happen where I live.
